amendment.description: Amendment increases by $5 million the minimal level of funding for the International Trade Administration for use in dealing with Chinese trade practices.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funds for China antidumping and countervailing duty enforcement and compliance activities by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Turner (OH) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Turner (OH).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Turner (OH) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
